text: after the horrors of last night the
cleaner an army of sweepers descended on
the Erawan shrine to clear the rubble
and wash away the blood stains the
gilded statue that draws so many people
foreigners and ties to this spot
miraculously unharmed we witnessing the
most terrible teams the carnage the
suffering had faced shrine they're
trying to clean it up now they've opened
up the roads to traffic the police have
extracted what clues they care but this
is still a city in shock but the
authorities now have a lead on the
bodies hoping this grainy video was
taken a few minutes before the blast
watch the man in the yellow shirt he
sits on the banishment and takes off a
black backpack then walks away without
it they are urgently seeking this man
that was the exact spot where the bomb
went off they are scenes that those of
us who witnessed them will never forget
nor will the people of Bangkok who
haven't experienced a terrorist attack
like this before
shattered windows bent and twisted metal
unsettling reminders that this city too
is vulnerable Jonathan had BBC news
Bangkok
